paragraphs.title: Create a new database
paragraphs.text:
%mariadb

CREATE DATABASE accounting;

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.title: Create a new bitemporal table
paragraphs.text:
%mariadb

CREATE TABLE accounting.employees (
    id INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
    first_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    last_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    department VARCHAR(25) NOT NULL,
    salary DECIMAL(9,2) NOT NULL,
    date_start DATE NOT NULL,
    date_end DATE NOT NULL DEFAULT '9999-12-31',
    PERIOD FOR emp_period(date_start, date_end),
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
) WITH SYSTEM VERSIONING;

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.title: Insert values
paragraphs.text:
%mariadb

INSERT INTO accounting.employees (first_name, last_name, department, salary, date_start) 
VALUES 
    ('Tracy', 'Smith', 'HR', 65000.00, '2016-01-01'),
    ('James', 'Brown', 'MKT', 45000.00, '2016-04-15'),
    ('Stacy', 'Crowder', 'ENG', 80000.00, '2017-08-23'),
    ('Kim', 'Martin', 'PM', 75000.00, '2017-08-23'),
    ('Zachary', 'Quinto', 'SALES', 55000.00, '2019-01-08');

paragraphs.title: Verify the data has been inserted
paragraphs.text:
%mariadb

SELECT * FROM accounting.employees;

paragraphs.text:
%mariadb

paragraphs.title: Update a record
paragraphs.text:
%mariadb

/* Updating records */

UPDATE 
    accounting.employees
SET
    department = 'ENG'
WHERE
    first_name = 'Kim' AND
    last_name = 'Martin'

paragraphs.text:

SELECT * FROM accounting.employees;

paragraphs.title: Select all record history
paragraphs.text:
%mariadb

SELECT 
    *, row_start, row_end 
FROM 
    accounting.employees
FOR SYSTEM_TIME ALL;

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.title: Select point in time record history
paragraphs.text:
%mariadb

SELECT 
    *, row_start, row_end 
FROM 
    accounting.employees
FOR SYSTEM_TIME 
    AS OF '2020-03-26 14:15';

paragraphs.title: Delete a record
paragraphs.text:
%mariadb

DELETE 
FROM 
    accounting.employees 
WHERE 
    first_name = 'Kim' AND 
    last_name = 'Martin'

    *, row_start, row_end

    accounting.employees
FOR SYSTEM_TIME ALL;

paragraphs.title: Update record for (application) time period
paragraphs.text:
%mariadb

UPDATE accounting.employees 
    FOR PORTION OF emp_period
     FROM '2018-06-01' 
     TO '9999-12-31'
SET 
    salary = 100000.00
WHERE 
    first_name = 'Stacy' AND 
    last_name = 'Crowder';

paragraphs.title: Select all records
paragraphs.text:
%mariadb

SELECT 
    *
FROM
    accounting.employees
WHERE
    first_name = 'Stacy' AND 
    last_name = 'Crowder';

paragraphs.title: Select all (including invisible system columns) records

    *, row_start, row_end
FROM
    accounting.employees
WHERE
    first_name = 'Stacy' AND 
    last_name = 'Crowder';

paragraphs.title: Delete records by (application) time period
paragraphs.text:
%mariadb

DELETE FROM accounting.employees 
    FOR PORTION OF emp_period
       FROM '2018-10-01'
         TO '2018-10-31'
WHERE 
    first_name = 'Stacy' AND 
    last_name = 'Crowder'
%mariadb
